testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And I set the Enable User Tours checkbox state to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then I click on the View Profile link
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And I reset completed user-tours
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then The user tour is present on page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And The user tour template is loaded correctly
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And I navigate to the last step of the user-tour
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then The user tour is present on page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: And The user tour template has next button transformed into end button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: Then I end the user-tour
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct
